title: Trump Misstates Key Fact About NC in SOTU
summary: Trump incorrectly claimed Charlotte stabbing suspect entered via open borders; suspect was a U.S. citizen.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the spread of misinformation and its potential impact on public perception of immigration issues.

title: Swimming Pool Filter Maker Operates Plant in Clemmons, NC
summary: Hayward, a Charlotte-based company, is the largest private employer in Clemmons, NC, with over 1,000 workers.
charlotte_impact: Showcases the economic importance of manufacturing and private employers in smaller NC towns.

title: Trade Shows in Charlotte Leverage Canopy Tents for ROI
summary: Charlotte trade show exhibitors focus on flexibility, visibility, and ROI when using custom canopy tents.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates marketing strategies employed by businesses to maximize their presence and investment.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks Vice President
summary: Charlotte-based Mosaic Capital Partners is seeking a VP of Business Development to expand employee ownership in businesses.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment opportunities within the private equity sector in Charlotte.

title: Florence Airport Passengers Increased in 2025
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw passenger growth in 2025, despite losing an American Airlines flight to Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the fluctuating dynamics of regional air travel and the impact of airline decisions.

title: Women Tortured and Killed Girl in Dog Crate in NC
summary: Three NC women are charged with the child abuse death of Dominique Moody, who was allegedly tortured and kept in a dog crate.
charlotte_impact: Highlights a horrific case of child abuse and the urgent need for child protection services.

title: Homeowners Reassessing When to Sell
summary: Homeowners are reassessing when to sell due to shifting market conditions. (Travis Buys Home)
charlotte_impact: Indicates a potential shift in the real estate market and homeowner behavior.

title: KPN Facilitates $20M in Acquisitions
summary: KPN Consulting Services facilitated $20M in acquisitions and expanded economic development partnerships.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates the role of consulting firms in driving economic growth and business expansion.

title: Shelby Grandma Hits Big Lottery Win
summary: A Shelby grandma won a lottery prize with a 1 in 3.1 million chance after purchasing a $10 ticket.
charlotte_impact: Represents a feel-good story of unexpected fortune and the excitement of lottery wins.

title: Plaza Midwood Taproom Closing After Five Years
summary: Southern Strain Brewing is closing its Plaza Midwood taproom after five years of operation.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the challenges faced by local businesses and the changing landscape of the brewery scene.

title: 29 Teens Charged After Fights at Lancaster High School
summary: 29 teens were charged with simple assault following 'disruptive' fights at Lancaster High School.
charlotte_impact: Raises concerns about school safety and the prevalence of violence among teenagers.

title: One Dead, One Hurt in Head-On Crash in Monroe
summary: A head-on collision in Monroe resulted in one fatality and one serious injury near Goldmine Road and Riverchase Drive.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the dangers of road accidents and the importance of safe driving practices.

title: Protest Outside Developer's Office Over Alleged ICE Detention Center
summary: Protestors gathered outside a Charlotte developer's office over claims of a deal with DHS for an ICE detention center in Concord.
charlotte_impact: Reflects community concerns and activism related to immigration enforcement policies.

title: Damp Friday Leads to Fantastic Weekend
summary: A wet Friday is followed by a weekend with temperatures in the upper 60s and 70s.
charlotte_impact: Provides a positive outlook on the weekend weather forecast and encourages outdoor activities.

title: 2 Monroe Officers Hospitalized After Crash
summary: Two Monroe Police officers were hospitalized after a crash on U.S. Highway 74 while responding to a cardiac arrest call.
charlotte_impact: Emphasizes the risks faced by law enforcement officers while performing their duties.
